snippet: The exodus of big N.H.L. stars to Europe accelerated Monday as the Devils’ Ilya Kovalchuk signed with a K.H.L. team and the Stars’ Jaromir Jagr suited up for the club he owns in the Czech Republic.
abstract: The exodus of big N.H.L. stars to Europe accelerated Monday as the Devils’ Ilya Kovalchuk signed with a K.H.L. team and the Stars’ Jaromir Jagr suited up for the club he owns in the Czech Republic.

headline.main: Kovalchuk and Jagr Join Teams in Europe
